title: Pinch zoom stopped working and I was told the pinch zoom is not longer a feature on Google Pixle?
content:
My pinch zoom stopped working a couple month ago and I've tried contacting Google support and finally was told that after the June update, Pinch zoom and double tap zoom is no longer a feature for "ALL" Google Pixel phones. 

From Google Map to Google map, pinch zoom does not work anywhere.

Is that true?? Does all of your pinch zoom stopped working or Google just pull a pile of xxoo and tried to shut me up?
